taskDescription:
Solve <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>13</mn>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mo>≥<!-- ≥ --></mo>
  <mn>65</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">-13m \geq 65</annotation></semantics></math>, graph the solution on the number line, and write the solution in interval notation.
